definition: to cry/to weep aloud/to crow/to hoot

sentences.english: There was an infant squalling in the back of the church.
sentences.chinese: 有個嬰兒在教堂後部大聲啼哭。

sentences.english: A baby cries and gurgles but does not use articulate speech .
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒僅啼哭和咯咯作聲，卻無法清晰的發音。

sentences.english: The one thing a human baby has hard-wired into its system is the ability to cry.
sentences.chinese: 人類嬰孩唯一的生存本能就是啼哭。

sentences.english: Better the child’s cry than the mother’s sigh.
sentences.chinese: 寧願孩子啼哭，不願母親嘆息。

sentences.english: Check all the obvious reasons the baby might be crying.
sentences.chinese: 查找所有可能引起寶寶啼哭的原因。

sentences.english: A herd of deer were wailing.
The baby emitted forth a cry.
You may find yourself getting angry or crying as you write.
sentences.chinese: 當你寫作的時候，你可能發現你正在生氣或啼哭。

sentences.english: At first the infant, Mewling and puking in the nurse's arms.
sentences.chinese: 最初是嬰孩，在保姆的懷中啼哭嘔吐。

sentences.english: She might still be crying for being wronged .
sentences.chinese: 她或許因爲受了冤枉還在啼哭。

sentences.english: The crying of human being when birth means life is about to go through all kinds of afflictions.
sentences.chinese: 人一生下來的啼哭就預示着人生就要經歷種種磨難。

sentences.english: Ling Feng made the baby stop crying.
sentences.chinese: 凌峯使嬰兒停止了啼哭。

sentences.english: The crying baby then could by no means call up his conscience.
sentences.chinese: 哇哇啼哭的嬰兒也無法喚醒他的良知。

sentences.english: Here are a few ways to soothe your sweet little crybaby.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來分享一些安撫啼哭寶寶的方法。

sentences.english: They lurched onto the tundra like bawling infants.
sentences.chinese: 他們像啼哭的嬰兒蹣跚地邁上凍原。

definition: to bawl/to cry/to wail/to howl/also written 號哭|号哭[hao2 ku1]
swaddling clothes/fig. early stage of development/infancy
to cry out/to bark out a sound
lit. cries of grief shake the heavens/great sorrow (idiom)
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
